email_subject: Next MS Office? Here's what I'd add--and delete [ANCHORDESK]
email_body:
The next version of Microsoft Office is due in the next year or so. If you were product manager for the industry-standard office suite, what would you add? What would you get rid of? What would you fix? Here's my wish-list Top Ten.

NOTE: Why we're changing our publishing schedule
